languages.text: {n}Речь девушки становится все более наполненной терминами и процентами. В ход идут отчеты {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмехаников{/g} и доклады капитанов звездных судов. Напор и хватка Астарции затыкают даже самых язвительных из комментаторов. Все они молча стоят, пытаясь осмыслить сказанное девушкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Речь девушки становится все более наполненной терминами и процентами. В ход идут отчеты лексмехаников и доклады капитанов звездных судов. Напор и хватка Астарции затыкают даже самых язвительных из комментаторов. Все они молча стоят, пытаясь осмыслить сказанное девушкой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

Напор и хватка Астарции затыкают даже самых язвительных из комментаторов. Все они молча стоят, пытаясь осмыслить сказанное девушкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages are creeping into her words. She is quoting Lexmechanic reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigor and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand wordlessly, trying to understand what she's saying.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アスタルチアの演説には段々と専門用語と損得勘定が混ざってきた。{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}の報告と、スターシップのキャプテンの説明を引用している。アスタルチアの活力と鋭い知性は、悪意に満ちた評論家の大半をも黙らせるのに十分だ。他の面々は無言で立っており、アスタルチアの発言を消化しようとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アスタルチアの演説には段々と専門用語と損得勘定が混ざってきた。{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}の報告と、スターシップのキャプテンの説明を引用している。アスタルチアの活力と鋭い知性は、悪意に満ちた評論家の大半をも黙らせるのに十分だ。他の面々は無言で立っており、アスタルチアの発言を消化しようとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}她的话语中出现了越来越多的专业术语和具体数字。她引用了各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}思律机僧{/g}报告与星舰舰长的原话，她充满活力的敏锐思维，足以让最恶毒的评论家哑口无言。所有人都默默地站在原地，试图消化她的意思。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她的话语中出现了越来越多的专业术语和具体数字。她引用了各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法律技工{/g}报告与星舰舰长的原话，她充满活力的敏锐思维，足以让最恶毒的评论家哑口无言。所有人都默默地站在原地，试图消化她的意思。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cada vez añade más y más terminología técnica en su explicación. Cita informes de {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g} y relatos de capitanes. El vigor y la claridad mental de Astartia bastan para silenciar incluso a los comentaristas más mordaces. Todos guardan silencio, intentando digerir sus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cada vez añade más y más terminología técnica en su explicación. Cita informes de {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g} y relatos de capitanes. El vigor y la claridad mental de Astartia bastan para silenciar incluso a los comentaristas más mordaces. Todos guardan silencio, intentando digerir sus palabras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elle poursuit ses explications, ponctuées de plus en plus de termes techniques et de pourcentages, allant même jusqu'à citer des rapports de {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécaniciens{/g} et des comptes rendus de capitaines de vaisseaux. Même ses détracteurs les plus fervents sont réduits au silence par sa vigueur et sa vivacité d'esprit. Tous se taisent, tentant tant bien que mal de digérer les informations qu'elle débite à toute vitesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle poursuit ses explications, ponctuées de plus en plus de termes techniques et de pourcentages, allant même jusqu'à citer des rapports de {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécaniciens{/g} et des comptes rendus de capitaines de vaisseaux. Même ses détracteurs les plus fervents sont réduits au silence par sa vigueur et sa vivacité d'esprit. Tous se taisent, tentant tant bien que mal de digérer les informations qu'elle débite à toute vitesse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Immer mehr technische Fachausdrücke und Prozentwerte schleichen sich in ihren Vortrag. Sie zitiert {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g}-Berichte und Aussagen von Raumschiffcaptains. Astartias Engagement und ihr scharfer Verstand bringen selbst die giftigsten Kommentatoren zum Schweigen. Alle stehen nur noch da und versuchen zu verstehen, was sie sagt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

Astartias Engagement und ihr scharfer Verstand bringen selbst die giftigsten Kommentatoren zum Schweigen. Alle stehen nur noch da und versuchen zu verstehen, was sie sagt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gittikçe daha fazla teknik terim ve yüzdelik veri saymaya başlıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanik{/g} tutanaklarıyla yıldız gemisi kaptanlarının raporlarından alıntı yapıyor. Astartia'nın şevki ve keskin zekâsı, en nefret dolu eleştirileri bile susturmaya yetiyor. Eleştirenlerin hepsi öylece durup Astartia'nın dediklerini sindirmeye çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more technical terms and percentages creep into her speech. She quotes {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports and accounts of starship captains. Astartia's vigour and sharp mind are enough to silence even the most venomous of commentators. They all stand there in silence, trying to digest what she's saying.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gittikçe daha fazla teknik terim ve yüzdelik saymaya başlıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanik{/g} tutanaklarıyla yıldız gemisi kaptanlarının raporlarından alıntı yapıyor. Astartia'nın şevki ve keskin zekâsı, en nefret dolu yorumları bile susturmaya yetiyor. Hepsi de öylece duruyor, Astartia'nın dediklerini sindirmeye çalışıyor.{/n}
